tests.name: Default /app/ endpoint
tests.run: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl -I http://localhost:${PORT}/app/ && sleep 5s

tests.name: Nonexistent endpoint
tests.run: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl -I http://localhost:${PORT}/app/nonexistent/ && sleep 5s

tests.name: Random coin flip endpoint /app/flip/
tests.run: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl http://localhost:${PORT}/app/flip/ && sleep 5s
